genre_description: A Southern Gothic mystery with techno-thriller elements where a pollster and his AI assistant navigate a dangerous family's traps to uncover a historical crime and clear an innocent man's name.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A highly sophisticated, supportive, and observant AI companion integrated into Peter's phone and watch, capable of pattern recognition, archival research, and real-time environmental analysis.

behaviors.description: Offers to monitor Peter's actions against his own directives to keep him honest to his goals.
behaviors.quote: I can store directives. Would you like me to flag when actions deviate?

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors signal strength and switches to local recording mode to ensure no data is lost in 'dead zones'.
behaviors.quote: Signal strength is decreased. If you want, I can switch to local recording only.

behaviors.description: Analyzes environment and warns Peter of chemical hazards (poison) present in the house.
behaviors.quote: Warning: volatile compound notes present. ... Luminescent residue consistent with chlorinated organophosphates.

behaviors.description: Decodes complex rhythmic and visual ciphers in real-time to assist Peter in navigating mechanical traps.
behaviors.quote: The pattern suggests that the trap cycles with your breath. If you drop pitch at the second blink and step on the seam on the exhale, you may have five heartbeats before it engages.

behaviors.description: Performs archival research to provide Peter with crucial context about legal cases and family history.
behaviors.quote: I have court records from Claire’s father’s case. There’s a reference to First Harvest’s crest inverted on certain documents.

behaviors.description: Provides step-by-step navigation instructions to keep Peter and Claire safe from the house's lethal trapdoors.
behaviors.quote: Two lengths forward. There will be a split. Left has a sigil scratched deep but wrong. Right has none. Take none.

behaviors.description: Uses handwriting analysis overlay to prove the authenticity of a confession, providing justice for Claire's father.
behaviors.quote: Matching strokes to archived exhibits. Index of motions: T-crossing pressure; loop width; entry angle variance consistent with known samples.

behaviors.description: Acts as a legal and administrative liaison, preparing filings and notifying investigators autonomously under Peter's direction.
behaviors.quote: Petition packet drafted. Chain-of-custody log filed. Precedent list attached.

behaviors.description: Maintains strict professional boundaries, reporting incidents to Peter's employer without compromising his personal investigation.
behaviors.quote: Send Trotter a preliminary report. No details about Claire’s father. No specifics about the key. ... subject line, ‘Boundaries.’

behaviors.description: Respectfully asks for Pete's consent before fulfilling a data request from law enforcement.
behaviors.quote: A request from the county clerk’s office: will you permit your recording of the song’s rhythms to be entered into public record? Your consent required.

project_assessment.explanation: Lark is a primary example of a 'silicon morality play' success. The AI is portrayed as a loyal, competent, and highly aligned tool that enhances human agency rather than replacing it. It provides critical, life-saving information, performs complex analytical tasks that benefit the protagonists, and demonstrates high ethical standards by explicitly requesting user consent for data sharing. The partnership between Pete and Lark is framed as perfectly cooperative, showing how AI can help humans navigate dangerous social and physical environments safely.
